title: unnai ninandAlE
sahitya:
unnai ninaindAlE inbam URudE uLLam niRai kapAli IshA


caraNam 1    unnai marandhAlE nenjam EngudE ulagam iruL mayamAi kANgudE
  caraNam 2    un tirunAmattai uccarittAlE uDal muzhuvadum inikkudE IshA
  caraNam 3    anbar tirukkUTTattODu kalandAlE Anandak-kaDal pongudE uLLil
  caraNam 4    un tirukkOyilai valam vandAlE uLLak-kavalai ellaam maraiyudE
